sentences.sentence: The incidence rate and mortality rate of ILT peafowls during the treatment period were determined.
sentences.translation: 观察治疗期患有传染性喉气管炎孔雀的发病与死亡情况。

sentences.sentence: Conclusion Chinese medicine S-kangdu mixture has obvious preventive and therapeutic effects on ILT peafowls.
sentences.translation: 结论中药复方s抗毒合剂对防治传染性喉气管炎效果良好。

sentences.sentence: Objective To investigate the preventive and therapeutic effects of Chinese medicine S-kangdu mixture on infectious laryngotracheitis (ILT) in peafowls.
sentences.translation: 目的探讨中药复方s抗毒合剂对传染性喉气管炎的防治作用。
